bindings.name: principalsRawIn
bindings.sqlQuery: SELECT c.objectId, c.principalType, c.displayName, c.accountEnabled, c.deleted, c.userPrincipalName, c.userType, c.mail, c.jobTitle, c.department, c.lastSignInDateTime, c.lastNonInteractiveSignInDateTime, c.passwordPolicies, c.usageLocation, c.externalUserState, c.onPremisesSyncEnabled, c.onPremisesSamAccountName, c.onPremisesSecurityIdentifier, c.managerId, c.risk, c.authMethods, c.securityEnabled, c.mailEnabled, c.groupTypes, c.membershipRule, c.membershipRuleProcessingState, c.isAssignableToRole, c.visibility, c.classification, c.memberCountDirect, c.memberCountTransitive, c.appId, c.appDisplayName, c.servicePrincipalType, c.appRoleAssignmentRequired, c.servicePrincipalNames, c.tags, c.spCredentials, c.signInAudience, c.publisherDomain, c.verifiedPublisher, c.credentials, c.deviceId, c.operatingSystem, c.operatingSystemVersion, c.isCompliant, c.isManaged, c.trustType, c.profileType, c.manufacturer, c.model, c.approximateLastSignInDateTime, c.registrationDateTime, c.lastModified FROM c
